    About Me

    Hey! I'm Suyash Bajpai. Welcome to my personal blog.

    I'm an undergraduate student in the department of Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering at Government Engineering College, Raipur. I've a deep rooted interest in Mathematics and Electronics in general but what I absolutely love is computer programming and knowing about the latest advancements in technology.

    About Blog

    My proposal for co-oCCur: High speed subtitle synchronization tool has been accepted for Google Summer of Code, 2019 with the amazing organization - CCExtractor Development 🤩. I will be spending my summer building it.

    For the next several months, this will be the home for all the blog posts related to my GSoC project. I intend to post detailed accounts of what I learn, the obstacles I face and how I overcome them.

    Please follow the blog for future updates! 🙂
